name: miami
content:

a large city in the southeastern US state of Florida: Two months later she was in Miami. Any visitor to Miami must go to see Miami Beach.
More examplesFewer examplesHe is spending his spring under the Miami sun.The conference will likely take place in Miami.They had relatives in the Miami Cuban community.
